DOC.brief_summary: This study assess pharmacokinetics NKTR-118 subject renal impairment compare subject normal renal function .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Pharmacokinetics NKTR-118 Subjects With Renal Impairment Compared That Subjects With Normal Renal Function
DOC.criteria: Provision sign write date informed consent prior study specific procedure . Male female volunteer age 18 80 year ( inclusive ) normal renal function , suffer moderate severe renal impairment ESRD . Male subject sexually active must willing use barrier method contraception ( condom ) . Women must nonchildbearing potential , childbearing potential , must negative pregnancy test ( screen admission ) use highly effective form birth control 3 month enrollment willing use highly effective form birth control study 3 month last dose IP . Have BMI 18 40 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) weigh least 50 kg . Subjects must able understand comply study procedure , restriction requirement . History clinically significant medical history , opinion Investigator Sponsor , may either put subject risk participation study , influence result , subject 's ability participate study . History presence gastrointestinal hepatic condition know interfere disposition study drug ( except renal function impairment ) . Subjects function kidney transplant . Acute illness , surgical procedure trauma within 2 week enrollment first administration study drug Known suspect history drug abuse judge Investigator .
